Let's talk about the place first. Located at the edge of Sat Masjid Road near the Dhanmondi 27 turning, which provides to be central location for people coming in from Mohammadpur, Lalmatia or Dhanmondi. While they do not have a dedicated parking place they try to make up for it by having numerous guards. Interior is very nice. Well decorated, modern and unlike some very dimly lit restaurants opening up nowadays, this proved to be a welcoming experience offering something qui...te on the contrary. The ambience is very inviting with music in the background and ample room between tables to not overhear the conversations from tables nearby. We were a family of four. After being handed the menu which had decent amount of items we ordered a standard Chinese dinner for my parents whilst me and my sister opted for something from the Indian cuisine. We had ordered more than our table of four could accumulate so were moved to a bigger table. Food was served within approximately 20 mins. The food was good, my parents seemed to enjoy the Chinese cuisine and from little of what I tasted i felt the quality was certainly there. My order of tandoori chicken was good but I felt the butter nan to be pretty dry. The owner as well as the manager came around to ask if the food was okay and I let them know of my dry experience of the nan and they immediately changed it. The second batch of nan was much better. Service proved to be admirable and quite helpful when needed. The staff behavior was excellent. All in all it was a great dining experience. A lot of the food we ordered were leftover so we packed it to take home. They gave us a promotional discount but the final bill without the discount seemed reasonable, we were actually expecting the bill to be more but pleasantly surprised. One of the managers actually walked us to our car while leaving. This feeling of exclusiveness felt great and really made you feel the restaurant is keen on delivering good food and service. Hope they are able to maintain this standard in the future. FINAL VERDICT: Location: 9/10 Interior: 10/10 Food: 10/10 Service: 10/10 Price: 9/10
On of my favourite resturant, loved the food specially guwalati kabab and veg biryani.... Yummy

Those who loves to have ডাল-ভাত along with spicy beef, mutton or chicken, this is the best restaurant for them ! Chui (চই/চুই), the mighty spice that can make you drool anywhere at any moment ! The beef/mutton/chicken pieces where big enough to fill your tummy ! The pulse and the smashed potato are good too. You can choose your own damn meat and very own piece. The service persons are well behaved. Over all a damn cozy place to have lunch or dinner with your beloved ones. Loved it.

I visited few days back. The overall environment and decoration is very pale and sub-standard. The plastic chairs and dirty tables, unhygienic washroom and basin area ruined my taste for having food. Nevertheless, I ordered for their beef and mutton. Simply, taste was rubbish. The mutton was stale and just served after warming the mutton cooked the other day. Anyway, more was left for me. When wished to try their chicken, I was told that it was finished though it was 9 pm only. The brinjal fry was burnt and was not edible at all. The dal was simply as good as that served in a street shop. And finally, the rice was of such poor quality that I can't even imagine even to serve this quality rice to my domestic servant. OK, I tried their firni also and I don't wanna say any more. A total wastage of my money. Determined not to visit ever.

Now the rating is like this because I wasn't able to have food here due to their lack of responsibility. I was planning to go to their Bashundhara branch for sehri and for that I did talk to them a few times to ensure they are open for sehri. Now after going there at 1 AM monday night(Tuesday 1am) I found them closed. When asked they replied they ran out of food that day just after the Iftar and that's why they are closed today. Very unprofessional and hugely disappointing. ... Couldn't you post a note saying that in your FB page!!! What the hell is wrong with you guys!!!

For me it was like tasting the flavour I always liked. It was not like what I used to have in Abbas Hotel or in Satkhira or in Khulna Zero Point but its one of the places where the traditional food of Khulna region can be found here in Dhaka. It made me feel nostalgic. So, I have no complain about the environment or service :)

সম্মানিত অভিভাবক, আসসালামু আলাইকুম, আশা করি ভাল আছেন । আপনাদের ছেলে/মেয়ের কথা চিন্তা করে আমাদের একটি ক্ষুদ্র প্রয়াস । তা হল, কীভাবে আপনাদের ছেলে মেয়েরা ঘরে বসেই ভাল মানে শিক্ষক/শিক্ষিকা পেতে পারে। এখনকার বাংলাদেশে যে প্রতিযোগিতা তা ঠিকে থাকা অনেক কঠিন। এ জন্য দরকার ভাল মানে শিক্ষক/শিক্ষিকা । তাই আমাদের একটি শিক্ষক/শিক্ষিকার অনলাইন প্লাটফরম রয়েছে । সেখান থেকে আমরা অভিজ্ঞ গৃহ শিক্ষক/শিক্ষিকা দিচ্ছি । ধন্যবাদ । Phone Number: 01849-649978

যাব যাব বলে যাওয়া হচ্ছিলো না! 😒 কিন্তু অবশেষে গেলাম! ✌ অর্ডার করলাম, ৫ মিনিটেই সব রেডি! খাওয়া শুরু করার পর একটা ধাক্কা খাইলাম! এতো দিন যা শুনছি এটা তার থেকেও বেশি কিছু! 😲 Seriously I can't believe that কেউ এতো মজা করে Beef রান্না করতে পারে! 😍 আর তাদের ব্যবহার নিয়ে কিছু বলার নাই, অত্যন্ত ভদ্র! ☺ ... We tried there- . ChoiBeef(120tk)- 10/10 (Best ever) ChoiKolijaa(120tk)- 8/10 DaaL(30tk)- 9/10 (অনেক বেশি মজার) Alu Vhorta & Begun Vhorta(each 20tk)- 5/10 (quantity kom silo ektu beshi e kom onno jaegae aro beshi dei) :( . অন্য কোন আইটেম টেস্ট না করলেও অন্তত #চই_বিফ আইটেম টা ট্রাই করার জন্য হলেও চই ঝাল এ যেতে পারেন! ☺ কেউ কেউ তাদের নেগেটিভ রিভিউ দিয়েছে তাদের জন্য আমার পক্ষ থেকে ১ মিনিটের নিরবতা, সবার টেস্ট আলাদা মানলাম কিন্তু এটা কেমন আলাদা! -_- Yes, This is the first time but not the last because she said so.. ☺😛

But do u realize the price it becomes?? Does it match with the food?? Today I had iftar there.. I m deeply disappointed with everything. I had Fried R...ice with three items.. It was the worst set meal I hv ever had. If i analyse it briefly i will say Food Quality- 2*, Quantity- 1* , Price-1* (300/-) (Excluding VAT). It becomes 345/- total (Without water, Soft drink) .. After hearing a massive exaggeration about this place, went there for lunch. We wanted to try tacos but they said it's unavailable. Then we asked about nachos but they told us that it can be provided with beef only so finally we ordered Grind House Special Pizza 6 inches and club sandwich! And later...we repented for our decision....the pizza was burnt and tasted too bitter we couldn't even finish half! It was that horrible...and the sandwich was average...you can get that a...t any usual fastfood shop so I had to fill my tummy with two coca colas...moreover the place was too hot.. we asked why they aren't running their air conditioners and they said it's because of load shedding...come on you should take the necessary step to run one ac atleast! They were playing music on high volume so they could have the facility of running atleast one ac during power cut anyways I'm giving one star for their service...it was the only thing I liked about the place...had the wish to taste their Jambola Pasta but after having the pizza I wanted to run as soon as possible...sorry but greatly disappointed after hearing such high reviews OVERHYPED ! ... So... That's my girlfriend's review ... Lol... . xD So I spent 720/- for 2 Coca-Cola & a leftover burnt pizza... OH dear., Thank you.. -_- You are doing great .. Grind House.. Will never ever come again.. :/

went there yesterday. First of all, the way of approach was very disappointing. I planned to order student menu, stated on their page. But the waiter said, These are not available now! I asked him to consult it with his manager. He went and came back within a minute and said, they can, but it will take long time. What a strategy to inhibit us to order those set menus as they are relatively cheap in price! After that, I gave feedback to their manager and he said that, there's... The Fried rice was very good with a good smell. The diameter of the glasses were so less that it could held no more than 150-200 ml of soft drink. The last devastating and irritating thing was, they proposed us at least 5 times to give review on Facebook about their food! Why man? Isn't it my choice that I like to give review or not? Do you people have rights to insist? I felt shame that I brought 2 of my friends there. Like others, you people opened up a restaurant to do business and I appreciate that. But, do that with dignity. I hope you will rectify your mistakes. Wish you a good luck.

লাইভ মিউজিক ক্যাফের প্রতি আমার আগ্রহ বরাবর ই একটু বেশি । আবার দেখলাম আমার এক ফ্রেন্ডের রিভিউ। তাই ধানমন্ডিতে ঘুরতে ঘুরতে চলে গেলাম সিনে ক্যাফে Cine Cafe তে ট্রাই করলাম সুইট এন্ড সওয়ার প্রোন উইথ ফ্রাইড রাইস এর একটা সেট মেনু (দাম ২৫০ টাকা), আর চিকেন পাস্তাটাও চেখে দেখলাম (৩২০ টাকা) ইন্টিরিওর এর কথাটা বলতেই হবে। CineCafe, থিম টা সিনেমা নিয়েই, একপাশে ফেলুদার সকল সিনেমার পোস্টার গুলো বাঁধাই করে একটা ফেলুদা কর্নার। একটু হাই চেয়ারে বসে কফির স্বাদও উপভোগ করতে পারবেন। আর সিলিং করা হয়েছে বাংলা সিনেমার সকল কিংবদন্তিদের ছবিকে ছবির রিলে রেখে। এক কথায় সিলিং ডেকোরেশান টা ভালো লেগেছে। আর আছে লাইভ মিউজিক, যা আপনার খাদ্য ভোজনে একটা বাড়তি মাত্রা যোগ করবে।

‌ভোজ খাবার খাওয়ার জন্য অামার খুব প্রিয় জায়গা ।এটা অামার চেম্বা‌রের পা‌শেই বলা যায় । ভো‌জের ভিত‌রে অা‌লোর বিন্যাস যথার্থ মানানসই ।এর প্র‌ত্যেক‌টি অাই‌টেম ভাল এবং গ্রহণ‌যোগ্য ।ত‌বে ভো‌জের খিচু‌ড়ি খাওয়া অামার জন্য তৃ‌প্তিদায়ক অ‌ভিজ্ঞতা ।এটা প্র‌ত্যেক‌টি সময় স্মৃ‌তিবহুল অনুর‌নিত দাহ্যপ্রদ সন্তু‌ষ্টিদায়ক বি‌শেষ অ‌ভিজ্ঞতায় অা‌লো‌ড়িত ক‌রে এবং কর‌বে ।কৃতজ্ঞতা তার প্র‌তি যি‌নি ভো‌জের অাচা‌ড়ি খিচু‌ড়ির সন্ধান দি‌য়ে লোভী বা‌নি‌য়ে‌ছেন ।

26/8/2018- Absolute Thai genuine Siamese dishes 5 Stars⭐️ The hot and spicy Tom yam soup with seafood was superb and it was beyond description of mere words...! Thai mango salad with crispy cat-fish was not only pleasing to the eyes but it had teased our tastebuds to the fullest as well...!... Stir-fried sliced beef with vegetables was equally good in both looks and taste...! Last but not least, even the steamed rice was fantastic and we whacked it all till the last grain...! A word of thanks to your great staff who had offered their best and impeccable service during our patronage at your outlet. Keep up the good job and we wish to have the chance to come back for more in the near future.

Had dinner with my family. Ordered appetizer platter, 2sopus, seafood salad, jasmine rice and redcurry. The waiter's behaviour was rather defensive and odd.. No customer services whatsoever. Extremely spicy food despite requesting that we have kids. They need to review their chef and staff
Totally disappointed seafood soup.

The worst Thai food ever! I went there five times to prove myself wrong, but the desi chef consistently served us worst possible food every time. First time I went with a friend and we tried a salad, rice noodle with prawn and finally a coconut ice cream. That was by far the acceptable ones, because we could at least finish eating. We have been fed with the lie that a Thai chef is working in the kitchen, whose big picture is proudly displayed at the entrance! From second time... onwards everything went wrong. Called the manager, who says he is looking into it and never returned. We asked the waiters who also disappeared and never came back. It is the third time we found out that their Thai chef has actually gone on leave two months ago, later found out he left four months ago. The current cook is a Bangladeshi who worked in Bangkok for many years. I am sure he never cooked Thai cuisine for Thai people. Probably worked sat ome desi restaurant in Bangkok cooking desi curries and bhartas! He is your so called “Thai” chef currently preparing all the dishes singlehandedly. My God! Last time we went, we ordered a seafood soup in coconut milk and beef Panama curry. The soup was so sweet that we thought we are having coconut milk sherbet! The beef panang curry was also very sweet. My friend and I were so disappointed that we vouched that we will NEVER COME BACK to Absolute Thai. What an absolute cheating! Be aware!

The worst Thai food i have ever had in my life, We order sea food soup, and pad Thai,, Sea food soup was really bad and dont ask about the pad Thai it was horrifying,, Noodels were overcooked, overloaded with sauce, too much sweet, and very raw egg kinda smell.. They told us their chef is from Thailand,... If a Thai chef couldn't cook pad Thai in a right way then who else does!? Maybe that's he couldn't rise up his career in Thailand ���� and came to Bangladesh ��.. The waste of money but our pictures came out really well,, thats the only good thing about this restaurant.��

Items were far less, not everything mentioned in the Iftar+Dinner buffet menu was there. When you are paying 1k++ for buffet and get only 18+ items to choose from you at least expect the taste to be spot on, but the food didn't taste good. They couldn't even get the fried rice right�. They claim to be an authentic Thai restaurant but their Pad Thai was the most disappointing dish out of all- It was noodle stirred in a handful of tomato ketchup and egg�. Also, main and desse...rt items were finished by the time we were done with our appetizer and entree. And the most frustrating part of the dinner was the payment. In their facebook post, they mentioned if you pay through certain bank's card you will enjoy 20% discount. So, I decided to pay with my card, which belonged to one of their mentioned banks, but they gave me only 15% discount. When I let them know about their post, they demanded proof-which I showed them on my phone, but still they were firm and rigid on their claim.

I just had the most amazing experience at Absolute Thai the other day. The Seheri platter is absolutely worth the money. You can have 2 platters only at BDT 850++ and the food is really delicious. Really liked the Chicken Satay and the Prawn Tempura. The Mango sticky rice was a bit weird but really yummy. Way to go Absolute Thai. Going to visit you soon again!

The pad thai was basically boiled flat noodle tossed in sauce and scrambled eggs, no bean sprouts or any greens. The mango with sticky rice was horrible with the rice undercooked maybe because the rice was frozen before it was boiled or whatever. Coconut ice cream was ok but too sweet, the only thing good was the tom yam soup but really getting 1 out of 4 dishes taste right is just disappointing.
Stylish decor and good food. A must go for food lovers

It’s been awhile since I’ve last been here. So, we decided to revisit. And man, how I regret it! The pad thai was so bad and so stinky that we decided to send it back. The only two things that were average was, the fried rice and the red chilli beef. Sea food green curry lacked the flavour and was smelly as well. Fishcake was to rubbery, chicken was basically an overdose of soya sauce. They had only one other table with a family of 5/6 along with us 4, yet my wife literally h...ad to shout “excuse me” to call out the waiter, at least 3/4 times. When I asked about if they had discount for credit cards, the waiter said no with a very straight face till I showed him that EBL signature cards are eligible for 15% discount on ala carte. He went to double check and agreed so. The only thing that probably stood out was they didn’t charge us for the pad thai, which we sent back. It’s really sad to see a restaurant doing so good when they open and only in a matter of time everything deteriorates. Not going back unless they give me free tickets to Thailand!!!
Not that bad. But could have better.

Yes i liked the food. But only thing so far i found totally absurd was the price of the local pepsi can which was 75tk 250ml which must not be more than 40tk highest, i myself buy "imported" pepsi or coke for 80tk, so for imported 330ml cans if you put the price over 100tk still i don't mind... but i am not bound to pay local 30-35tk cans for 75tk at least. It has nothing to do with service charge or any other expense, so no excuse please. One or two waiters need to know the basics before packing the left over foods as well.

Disappointed � I absolutely (#punintended) love to find faults when I'm at restaurants so that I can bash them on their facebook page. But sadly, their food tasted great and their service was actually nice. Unfortunately, they even replaced my red beef curry when they found out I was allergic to aubergine. I was also highly disappointed by their constantly smiling faces. So with great regret I am giving them 5 stars.

The DECOR of the place is absolutely simple. Nothing very fancy or bright, it's aristocratic. Everyone is well behaved & very welcoming. The DISHES we ordered were the almost regular Thai dishes which was served rather quick in different unique pots & plates. The aroma was spot on from every dish, as you put the Soup, soaked dim sim or even fried sea bass in your mouth it would just give you the burst of correct flavours. The PRICES seemed reasonable for 1:3 main dishes, 1:1 appetizers and deserts.

Shocking, We tried earlier it was fabulous, this time with friends of early years tried to enjoy but really felt very much disappointed, other than the fish cake and chicken tempura every dish was below par (even it was cold like local Hotel) and finally the so called noodles had to changed after serving,

This is my visit to "Absolute Thai". I am very impressed to have excellent mouth watering dishes. Ambiance is very nice and service is appreciable. On the other side, price are a bit high. Anyway, I wish Absolute Thai a great success in business.

Took my family for dinner and availed the 50% off that I won from their contest. I was worried about the quality since a lot of restaurants do not maintain food quality when they offer discounts. Thankfully their quality was top notch. Very satisfactory experience. �

Went with a friend for dinner. totally starving after not having had anything to eat the entire day, after shopping. Decided to go for thai food. We arrive around 5ish pm today, there were only 2 tables occupied so of course we expected the service to be fast, but of course that was not the case at all. We ordered thai ice tea, tom yum soup, absolute thai platter, pineapple rice and pad thai. The ice tea too much milk, which ended up really sweet. Tom yum soup was utterly ...disappointing, too much coconut milk. The platter, the only ok, not even good, but ok in it was the fried prawns. The rest was obsolutely rubbish. Pineapple rice was not up to standard at all, the prawn was not fresh at all and the worst of them all which was not even edible and which probably made me and my friend sick was the pad thai, which seemed like it was a left over from yesterday. It had a smell. It was obsolutely rubbish. Worst thai experience i have had. We lost out appetite in the end. We only had a mouthful, paid and left. I felt sick and havent had anything to eat but a chocolate brownie from somewhere else hoping the taste would all be gone and my appetite will get back. But no, my appetite is completely lost. I wouldnt even give this a 1 star! Terrible experience and the service was terrible as well! There were a number of staffs with only 3 tables occupied, including ours however, we had to get up to get the bill as no one came when we called out for anyone! First and last time here. Not worth the time, the food and the money! Dont waste your money! Save the trip! Go somewhere else!

one of the best thai food in bd.. in this country we rarely find authentic thai food but absolute thai is just absolutely amazing... after long time I found exceptional taste in Soup... omg...coconut ice cream.. sounds weird but this restaurant has totally changed my perception.. the chef is sooo magical...sooooooo happy after having lunch.. looking forward to see more & more unique food..
Filling Thai food at very reasonable price! Shobcheye mojar bepaar holo jara carb avoid Korte Chao, just order the fish or chicken and have it on its own or share it with soup.

Today i had lunch there with some of my friends. The food tasted good as a whole, took Tom yum soup and mixed fried rich with morning glory, chicken hot besil leaf, fish garlic pepper. That was really very nice. Thai lemon mint & lemon grass was simply mouthwatering. Usually for us Bangladeshies, chinese and thai aren't really different. Because we take the cuisine and tailor it in our own way which doesn't leave much of aurhenticity or difference. And we prefer it rather than the original taste as it is spice laced enough to please our tastebud. But, this restaurant lives up to its name and surprisingly the authentic food tastes much much better than our BD style chinese/thai! Overall it was a good experience...
The food is so delicious, I kept saying wow everytime I tasted another bite.

Horrible food. Absolutely tasteless. Probably the worst food I have ever tasted. Took beef with black pepper which was too salty. Then the item Thai Noodle with Prawn was just like eating plastic and was tasteless as well. This fried rice was OK. But the dessert item coconut ice was too much salty. And Mango sticky rice - you never ever going to pay for this awful food. When we called the manager and asked whether you have changed your cook or not? With a gentle smile he answered ''The main cook is going to join from 7th Feb'' I will give you some discount SIR since you did not like the food. Wahhh, what an answer!
Simply Good pricing strategy... I am not saying best but they served good food at reasonable price... nice place for simple hangout.

Horrible service, substandard food, I'm never taking recommendations online ever again. I come in and the waiter asks me "kar kacche ashcchen?" What is that? He spills soup while serving and doesn't apologize. He bumps into the table while bringing the main and again doesn't apologize. When I'm billed, I see something in it I didn't even order. Also, the waiters keep hovering around like vultures the whole time as you eat.

In BD its quite hard to find authentic Thai food as we are mostly recognized with "Bangla thai".Here "Absolute Thai" surely makes difference.The taste of authentic thai food is absolutely mouth watering. Hope to see more diversity in the dessert options.
Food is great! And specially i liked their ambiance. My strongest recommendation is the lemon mint drink. Will be going back again and again for sure.

Food was good... we ordered Prawn fried rice, seafood thai soup, beef with pepper and sweet and sour king prawns... apart from the rice (which was ordinary at best), everything else was good... Now the problems... the king prawns isn't really cheap, so one would expect equal sized prawns... but the restaurant does the same trick many other restaurants do, they give 2 actual king prawns and the other 2 is less than half the size.... our total for the food was 2200, which (if i...t was all inclusive) would have been perfect and amazing, and I'd have recommended it to my friends and would have visited again....however, the 15% VAT and 10% service charge took our total bill to closely BDT 3000... upon close calculation, we realised that the 3:1 rice which was 575 BDT would actually cost 718 including the ++ .... paying 718 Tk for 3 person rice feels ridiculous for even a 3 michellin star studded restaurant... similarly, water costs 65++ (BDT 80)... we went on a weekend and it was almost empty.... and I can understand why... despite the restaurant being really nice, not a lot of people would go there more than once... I hope the restaurant management realizes that and does something about it, because I'd love to go there again if the price becomes reasonable...
Food was extremely bad, they even charge a 3 year old baby, please don't go there.
One of the best for Thai cuisine without any doubt, best taste & Wonderful service,Highly recommended to try ifter buffet, I just love it.

It's something special for us. We were 4 people for ifter and buffet dinner .The food was good mainly I liked the most is juice and some different items. Service was good. Mostly I m amused to get a good amount of discount from manager ... it's awesome Thai food in this town . You must try before thinking much.
Welcoming Staffs, good vibes and nice friendly ambience, one of the best ifter & dinner buffet .. awesome food, Great Service, i will definitely suggest my friends to come here.. Really Love it !!!!!

The worst restaurant ever! The manager should learn how to behave with customers especially how to behave with a lady. We gave reservation for 10 people but unfortunately 2 of us couldn't show up. They charged for 10 people and when we went to argue the manager told me " i have never been to any good restaurant so i don't know how it works , all the good fancy restaurants take money for each reservation" and also said many disrespectful things. Never been this offended in my ...entire life. Restaurant is not about food it is also about the customer service. It seems the authority only wants one time customer, and want their customers to get insulted by their mannerless staffs. Its not about money it is about disrespect. The food tasted good as a whole, but I didn't like the mixed fried rice; to be very specific, it lacked seasoning, and had lumps of rice, which were not stir fried properly; the overdoneness came from the oozing mix of dark soya sauce. The Seafood Tom tum and chicken in coconut milk soups were tasty, but I've definitely tasted better flavoured ones in Dhaka. The prawn cakes tasted like store bought frozen ones, they were quite rubbery, the chicken satays tasted good. Chicken... with cashew nut, beef chilli and Fish with black pepper sauce were good, but nothing to be over-hyped about, as Dhaka has seen a vast number of restaurants serving Authentic Thai cuisine. The interior and service both were pleasant. I personally feel they still have space for improvement in their cooking techniques. Overall it was a good experience, my family was happy at the end of the day, and that's the most important thing.

I would not recommend this place to a friend.

Just had an Absolute Feast with my family at Absolute Thai! Started off the evening with the Mixed Appetizers which was great while we waited (considering that it was a packed Friday night, it did take time, but also gave us the chance to chat). The food was brilliant, and 3 hours later, I am still full and can barely move. The Coconut soup with Seafood was my personal favourite! Supplemented by the Dim Sum, an item that appeared to be a Thai Fuchka and Thai Fishcakes dipped... in a Creamy Garlic Sauce, it was a great opener. We ordered loads of items but the Pad Thai, Red prawn and the Chicken with Green Curry particularly stood out. We ended the evening with the (sweet) Lemon Grass juice and the infamous Sticky Rice with Mango (which really lived upto its hype). The restaurant itself is cozy, comfortable, illimunaited and has a classy feel without trying hard. This place is a must for anyone looking for fine dining with quality Thai food.

But alas, none of the foods looked appetising to start with; the rice & noodle were too sweet & the curries were salty. I didn't quite get from which angle this was Thai cuisine apart from some Thai spices & vegetation randomly thrown in. And apparently the chef is Thai. Well, I can imagine he was probably found selling Thai mama piaju on the streets of Thailand. Worst Thai food experience.

খাবারের ব্যবসা টা এমন যে, আপনি প্রতিদিন ১০০% একরকম স্বাদ ভোক্তাকে দিতে পারবেন না, কিন্তু একটা নির্দিষ্ট মান ধরে রাখতে হবেই। প্রথমবার গেলাম, সন্ধ্যা ৭:২০ এ ভাত, রুইমাছ, ডাল, লুচি, আলুর দম, লাচ্ছি অর্ডার করেছি। একমাত্র লুচি ছাড়া বাকি সবকিছু ছিল দুপুরবেলার ঠান্ডা আর শক্ত। বলার পরে ওভেন এ গরম করে দেয়। যা হোক, স্বাদ ছিল না একদম। পরিবেশনেও পরিচ্ছন্নতা ছিল না একদম। শুক্রবার ছিল, এবং আমরা স্কয়ারে কিছু টেস্ট করিয়ে খেতে যাই। কোন কথা বলার প্রবনতা বা শক্তি ছিল না। তবে এত পচা খাবার স্বাদ হবে আমি কল্পনাও করিনি। আপনাদের কাজের উন্নতি কামনা করছি। দুঃখিত, আমি ছবি তুলিনি।

নামটা জেনেছি আগেই। চলতি পথে চোখে পড়তোই, যেহেতু আমার প্রিয়ভাজন মেহেদী মাসুদ সস্ত্রীক এর উদ্যোক্তা। কিন্তু যাওয়া হয়ে উঠেনি। এবার আমার খুব প্রিয় কিছু মানুষকে নিয়ে নিরিবিলি নির্ভেজাল আড্ডার কথা ভাবতেই মাদলের কথাটাই আগে মাথায় এলো। আমরা মুগ্ধ। ঘরোয়া একটা পরিবেশে সবখানেই রুচিবোধ আর আন্তরিকতার ছোঁয়া। স্বাস্থ্যসম্মত খাওয়াদাওয়া, কম খরচেই। আর কি চাই? চলে আসতে পারেন সবাই। আমরা তো বার বার আসবো।
সত্যিই অসাধারণ। ঘরোয়া আয়োজনের জন্য আন্তরিক পরিবেশ।

Entered Spaghetti Jazz at roughly 2.45pm after calling them up to find out if they were open and where exactly the restaurant was. They asked us to order fast as they we gonna stop the kitchen operations at 3pm. We ordered 2 mushroom steaks. They were quick to serve the food. The grilled vegetables were good. Mashed potato was a little dry. Steak was dry and chewy. Mushrooms tasted bland. The waitress kept on hovering around us and handed the bill over to us not even halfway through the meal. She insisted we pay up the bill then mentioning that they were going to go on a break. At no point were the waiters/wiatresses cordial with us. Their attitude was outright impolite. We should have been notified on arrival that they were going to have a soft-close at 3 and wouldn't be able to serve us then. We would have been alright with that and left. Instead, they served us overcooked steaks and provided us the worst service I've experienced since 2013. To the Management: I am sorry but your steak was overpriced considering the quality and you really need to hire new staff. Alternatively you can also remove the service charge from your prices and make your employees work for the tip, who now get it regardless of how they treat your customers. The two stars I have given you is because of the grilled vegetables and the positive attitude of the guard with the beard; the only good things about our experience at SJ today. This is a very constructive criticism, please take note of it.

খাবার গুলোর দাম কম হলে ও আমার কাছে ভালো লাগে নেই তাদের খাবার তেমন টেস্টফুল ছিল না ঠান্ডার জন্য খাবার গুলো | কারণ তারা খাবার ঠান্ডা দেয় .. ওদের জাস্ট কেক তাই বেটার আমার মোটে.. বাট আসা করি খুব জলদি তারা তাদের ফুড এর প্রবলেমনা গুলো রিকভার করবে কিছু খাবার আমার কাছে ফ্রেশ ও মনে হয় নেই লাইক pizza otherwise ডেকোরেশন টা মুটামুটি ভালোই হোপ আসা করি ফিউচার এ আর ও উন্নতি করবে তারা next এ যখন যাবো ওদের খাবার আবার পুনরায় টষ্টে করবো ... সব ওকে থাকলে ratting 5 দিবো background প্লেস টা মোটামুটি ভালোই লাগছে আমার | বাট আজ ফুড এন্ড সার্ভ তেমন ভালো হয় নেই তাই আমার ratting দেয়া আছে... হোপ খুব দ্রুত রিকভার করা হবে আসা করি |

এক সপ্তাহে চার বার গিয়েছি। কয়েক টা খাবার ট্রাই করেছি।এর মধ্যে থাই সুপ, চিকেন পিজ্জা, ব্ল্যাক ফরেস্ট, চকলেট, মেল্ট চকলেট এর পেস্ট্রি মজার ছিল।চিকেন চাওমিন ও স্পেশাল চাওমিন প্রায় এক। যদিও প্রাইজ আলাদা। সেট মেনু গুলো মোটামুটি। খাবারের পরিমান ভাল, একজনের জন্য যথেষ্ট। চকলেট মিল্ক ভালো লাগেনি।তাদের ব্যবহার ভাল।জায়গা পুরান ঢাকা হলেও তারা সুন্দর সাজিয়েছে। দুপুরের সময় মানুষজন কম থাকে, রাতের বেলা গেলে কিছুক্ষন দাঁড়িয়ে থাকতে হতে পারে জায়গার জন্য। আড্ডা দেয়ার জন্য ভালো।

Probably the best buffet restaurant for dinner in Dhanmondi in terms of food quality and variety, price and ambience with a few small shortcomings that you'd do well to be prepared for. The buffet begins at your table with "starters" i.e. the day's bbq served at your table - chicken, fish and mutton with naan, which is refilled as you finish the serving. Although the waiters claim that the starters are "un-limited", after you've asked for a refill twice, service slows down an...d the waiters begin to discourage you from asking for more refills by repeatedly telling you that the bbq is only a starter and that you can now try the main buffet. It might get annoying, but as I found out, it's not bad advice since the buffet is quite good. The main dishes aren't the same old buffet dinner fare you see over and over again, but different and tasty. Their chicken biryani, creamy chicken and lemon fish in particular were really good. The chicken soup and chicken basil leaf were a little too salty though. The others - onion prawn, shahi paneer, beef etc were good. Among their deserts, their shahi tukra and brownie were good while the others - bread pudding, firni, fruit etc were just plain. However, they also serve kulfi! It wasn't out of the world, but hey - it's kulfi! Overall, definitely a place I'd recommend for dinner. And if you take my advice - don't try to get all your money's worth from the bbq alone; save it for the buffet, it's worth it. P.S. the menu changes from day to day, and so might your experience there.

আমার খাওয়া ঢাকা শহরের সব থেকে বাজে বুফে। কেনো? তারা আপনাকে ফার্স্টে বসার সাথে সাথেই খুব সুন্দর করে এনে কিছু কাবাব আইটেম (চিকেন টিক্কা,বীফ বটি ইত্যাদি) দিবে।আপনার খেতে ভালোই লাগবে।কিন্তু তারা আবার একটা ফালতু নিয়ম রাখসে,যে আপনি একবার কাবাব খাওয়া অফ করে মেইন ফুডে গেলে আর কাবাব খেতে পারবেন না।এক দুইবার সার্ভ করার পর ই তারা এসে বারবার করে জিজ্ঞাসা করবে,এখন অফ করবে কি না। এরপর আপনি মেইন ফুডে যাবেন।সত্যি বলতে আমি মেইন ফুডে খাওয়ার মতো কিছুই পাই নাই।কোন ওন্থন নাই,চিকেন ফ্রাই নাই, আছে কিছু বেস্বাদ আইটেম।যেগুলা খেয়ে আপনার মুইহের স্বাদ নষ্ট হয়ে যাবে।এরপর ইচ্ছা করবে আপনার আরেকটু কাবাব খেতে।গিয়ে দেখবেন আপনাকে আর কাবাব দিচ্ছেই না!! এরকম বাজে বুফে সিস্টেম আর কোথাও পাই নাই। একবার গেসি,পাপ করসি! আর ভুলেও যাবো না! পুরা টাকা লস!! :-/

এটা খুবই মান সম্পন্ন একটা আয়োজন। Absolute BBQ র প্রধান আকর্ষণ শুরুতেই টেবিলে কাবাবের আয়োজন। গরম গরম কাবাবের টেস্ট ই আলাদা!! ওদের সার্ভিস ও excellent! বুফের অন্যান্য আয়োজন ছিলো আকর্ষণীয়!প্রতিটি আইটেম ই খুব মজা।যদি ও আইটেম খুব বেশী নয়,কিন্তু যা আছে তার সিলেকশন ভালো।ডেজার্ট ও টেস্টি। কিন্তু আইটেম বাড়ানো উচিৎ। আমরা যারা ডেজার্ট পছন্দ করি তাদের জন্য কম মনে হয়েছে।এছাড়া বিভিন্ন সালাদ,থিক থাই স্যুপের আয়োজন ও ভালো।সব শেষে আন লিমিটেড কুলফি ও ছিলো অসাধারণ। লান্চ ৮০০/- আর ডিনার ১২০০/- ভ্যাট ছাড়া। আবার পানি ও কোমল পানীয় আলাদাভাবে কিনে নিতে হয়েছে। সাজেশন -- ১)ভ্যাট এবং পানীয় সহ এই দাম হলে ভালো।২) ডেজার্ট সহ অন্য আইটেম বাড়ানো দরকার। সর্বোপরি ধানমন্ডিতে এরকন আয়োজন খুবই ভালো লেগেছে। আমরা যারা এখানকার বাসিন্দা তারা খুবই উপকৃত হয়েছি। ধন্যবাদ।

খাবার ভালো, পরিবেশ সুন্দর। দাম একটু বেশী। বিকাল ৪টার পর এরা AC, লাইট সব বন্ধ করে দেয়। আমাদের চায়ের অর্ডার এরা ঠিকই serve করছে কিন্তু ওনাদের সময় পার হয়ে যাওয়ায় AC, LIGHT বন্ধ করে দিছে। আরো কয়েকটা জায়গায় buffet party করেছি কিন্তু এরকম rude ব্যবহার পাইনি। তাই কারো যদি বন্ধুদের নিয়ে সময় নিয়ে আড্ডা মারতে ইচ্ছা হয়, avoid this place.

Good variety of starters and main courses, but limited variety of desserts. Probably the best dining option in that area, which is quite important given the traffic in Dhaka. Only the buffet option is available, which is not convenient if you want to order something specific for a smaller amount, but overall the value for money is quite adequate. Drinks are not included in the buffet price.

I'm not sure why people gave it such high ratings. Spent time with a lot of loved ones, that was the highlight of the visit, certainly not the food. Never going there again even if someone paid me to go there.

It was nice, felt like an overseas buffet restaurant. The built-in BBQ grill table with unlimited kebabs is their main attraction. For starters, they served chicken boti, mutton shish, fish, Indian paneer & potato kebabs. I loved the chicken kebab most, it was well marinated with yogurt and spices. Other than that, they had chicken corn soup, papadums, chutneys & lots of salads. The main course had a rather small but good selection of dishes. The Hyderabadi biryani was nice b...ut the meat wasn't tender enough and it was made from "mixed cuts". I also liked the beef chili (bhuna), fish with lemon grass, prawn with tomato & basil and shahi paneer (similar to korma). There were only four dessert items with unlimited kulfi. The buffet price (Tk.1200) doesn't include VAT or any drinks. Overall, it would be better if they could include mutton boti kebab for starters and expand the menu for main course & dessert items.
Arrangements were good but service could be better... as we went for a buffet dinner, I found less items as desert.... There could be more main dishes... Truly speaking, I was not impressed....

From the outside it doesn't look much but its a different story once you step inside. Quite well decorated with comfortable sitting arrangements. Went there first time during for Iftar + dinner. The highlights of the menu were the whole lamb, whole fish, lasagna and teriyaki chicken. The lamb was well marinated and soft, while the fish was also equally marinated. The lasagna was exceptionally good specially for a buffet Iftar menu. One other thing which I liked was the live grilling station serving minute steaks, prawns and grilled mackerels. The staff were quite attentive, quickly clearing out our plates during the buffet and checked with us if food was ok or if we need anything else. Hope they can keep up the level of quality and service
This meal was very tasty. I want to go again and again.

Let’s talk about service: in one word awesome, the quality of food was really good and mouthwatering. The environment was really nice. I liked the BBQ part it’s really well cooked and juicy. Must visit this place for their quality food, hospitality and environment. Shaw's Steakhouse has already won acknowledgements and certifications for it’s quality food, service & environment. Wish them all the very best in future.

First thing that i look when i reach an eatery is a parking spot, even though Shaw is located near a very busy exit but their outdoor personnel efficiently managed and secured me a good parking spot. The decor and the ambience is very luxurious but entering the place made me feel awkward as i found the restaurant staffs (waiters) themselves sitting at guest chairs and watching TV. They couches are very cozy to sit but i also think they congested the place with too much sittin...g arrangement. They should have left more free space for free movement even though they have such a big floor. Their food quality is excellent, the steaks were perfectly marinated and cooked to perfect flavors and temperature, the taste and the look shows that dishes are cooked delicately here. However the portion is the issue!! I think the servings are not adequate, even the pictures taken of the food on the plate looks poor. I think the main courses served should have the standard portion Quantity that any other fine dining offers. The Manager was a very nice gentlemen. And the waiter who served us was also very attentive and gentle. Also charging 15Tk only for the bottled water was cool !!
I was always bit confused when someone asked me, which is the best steak place in city. now i can proudly say.. shaws steak is the best place to have steak. best ambience, best food, best service.

Pretty much the worst steak house I have ever been to..... Steak tasted salty and the chef probably do not have any idea how to prime a steak.... Used spices on a steak... Yuck.... Felt like I had fried masala beef fry....

If I go for honest reviews I am a die hard steak fan.. for which I keep on experimenting trying steaks at different places, wont go into direct comparison but I can assure you their steaks and dessert are the best out there. Point to be added this is the perfect place for well off dinner. Need a second visit out there :) Ambiance:9/10 Quality:8.5/10 Service:10/10 Price: good things cost you a bit

Also we complained about it to the manager and he gave us complementary desserts which also tasted smelly. The presentation was good, service was good but sadly the food taste was not up to the mark. It is an expensive food place so it is normal for customer like us to expect that high quality and value for money we are paying. Hope they will improve and give us the chance to say something good in the future!

Shaw’s Steakhouse in Dhaka is located in Gulshan 2, however is a major let down. First I wanted to go there for a dinner on the day before EID, since they had a promotion (discount plus free drink). I contacted the restaurant and confirmed that they are open. Unfortunately I went there then accordingly only to discover that the restaurant had closed already at 7.00 p.m. without prior notice. Nevertheless I agreed to give it a second try and went there once more today, only to... be even more disappointed. What I noticed immediately was that the restaurant was extremly empty, that though might have been to the early time of the day (7.45 p.m.). I would have loved to eat several of their items on the menu, but to my disappointment the majority of their items were unavailable. The issue started small, first one starter wasn’t available and we asked for some more time to re-think alternatives. Shockingly the issue of them being out of items continued, for the next 7 (starters, salds, steaks, pasta dishes,… !!) items we wanted to order each time as an alternative. They each time said that the item would be unavailable or that they had run out of stock (for example Beef nachos was apparently already sold out). . but at 7.45 p.m. and only two other customers at the restaurant that seemed to be highly unlikely.. ironically enough they later tried to suggest that we take one of their more expensive platters which contained 4 of the items that they had told us before would be unavailable and rest only the most expensive items were available from the menu. It is evident to me that the restaurant which had a decent amount of potential is just being run-down and not properly managed and that must be the reason why there are no or hardly any customers… (despite their social media presence being very professional).

খুব বাজে অভিজ্ঞতা হলো আজ। পাস্তা আর বিফ বার্গার অর্ডার করে বসে আছি ৪০ মিনিটের ও উপর। খাবার আসার খবর নাই। এর মাঝে অন্যদের খাবার দিচ্ছে। যারা আমাদের ও পরে আসছেন। ওয়েটার কে জিজ্ঞেস করলাম দেরি হবে কিনা? কোনো উত্তর দিলেন না। শুধু মাথা নাড়লেন। কি অদ্ভুত! ৪৭ মিনিটের মাথায় বার্গার দিলেন। পাস্তা মনে হয় না তখন ও রাস্তায়! আরও। ১০ মিনিটের পর আর পারলাম না। বললাম লাগবে না পাস্তা। কোনো পাত্তাই দিলো না! পরে বিল দেয়ার কথা বলার সময় বলে পাস্তা পুড়ে গেছে। আবার বলে কুকের হাত পুড়ে গেছে .... তাই দেরি। আমি বললাম তাহ‌লে অন্য দের কিভাবে দিলো? একটা পার্টি চলছিল ... ওদের ও সবাই কে দিচ্ছিল! আজব! পরে চুপসে গেল পুরো! জিবনেও আর যাব না। পুরো ফালতু! শুরু হওয়ার 2 দিনেই বাজে হওয়া শুরু!

'মিঃ হুপার' নামের বার্গার বাসায় আনা হয়েছিলো। খেয়ে ভালো লাগলো। তবে কিছু জিনিশ মনে হলো রিভিউতে লেখা উচিত, তাই লিখে দিলাম। ১। বার্গারের সাইজ ভালো হলেও প্যাটি আরো জুসি হতে পারতো এবং বার্গারের সাইজ বড় করা উচিত। তবে গ্রিল টাইপের একটা ফ্লেবার ছিলো তা ভালো। ২। রুটির মান আরো ভালো করা প্রয়োজন, এবং রুটির আয়তন বড় করা দরকার। ৩। বার্গারে প্যাটি ও চিজ পাশাপাশি নানা ধরণের সস দেয়া উচিত, যাতে এর স্বাদ আরো বৃদ্ধি পায়, কেবল টমাটো সস না, যদি বার্গারে টমাটো সস। বার্গারে পিয়াজ ছাড়া আর কেমন কোন ভেজিটেবল বা সালাদ বা এই ধরণের কোন ইনগ্রিডিয়েন্ট চোখে পড়লো না। ৪। বার্গারের দাম ৩৫০ টাকা। এটা অনেক বেশী, যদি মিঃ বার্গার তার খ্যাতি নিয়ে ছড়িয়ে পড়তে চায় তবে বার্গারের দাম ২০০ টাকায় নামিয়ে আনা উচিত। কারণ ২০০ টাকা দিয়েও সাধারণ মানুষ বার্গার কিনতে নিরুত্সাহিত বোধ করবে। প্যাটিতে যতটুকু মাংস থাকে, আর চিকেনের প্রাইজ যত তাতে ২০০ টাকা হলে মোটামুটি সবাই না হলেও মধ্যবিত্ত তা খেতে পারবে। আপাতত যা খেয়ে মনে হলো তা লিখে দিলাম। মিঃ বার্গার যদি রিভিউ ফলো করে খাবারের মান উন্নত করে, তবেই বুঝবো রিভিউ লেখাটা সার্থক হয়েছে। ধন্যবাদ।

আমরা ১২ জন মিলে রিজার্ভ করেছিলাম। যেই জিনিশ গুলো বাজে লাগছে তা হল_ ১-সালাদ অনেক আগে কেটে রাখা হইসে তাই শুকায় গেসিল। ২-২য় ফ্লোরে কোন এসির ব্যাবস্থা নেই। স্ট্যান্ড ফ্যান ছিল। ৩-খাবারের আইটেম পিকচারে জুসের যেই গ্লাসের ছবি দেওয়া ছিল বাস্তবের জুসের গ্লাস তার অর্ধেক। ৪- আশ্চর্য হলেও সত্যি আপনাকে পানি খাওয়ার গ্লাস দিবে কিন্তু পানির বোতল আপনাকে কিনে খেতে হবে। পানি দিবেনা গ্লাসে। ৫- বিল পে করার সময় রেইট যা আসার কথা তার থেকে বেশি দাবি করা হয়। (ইমোশনাল ব্ল্যাকমেইল করার চেষ্টা করা হয়,যেমন আমরা আপনাদের সার্ভ করে নিজে খাওয়ার টাইম পাইনাই)

Hats off Take A Bite. 1 Chicken Burger, a decent amount of French fry and a bottle of coke. Only 120 bdt. I would not say this is the best burger I ever had but it was good. ঢাকা শহরের বিভিন্ন স্থানে বিভিন্ন রেস্টুরেন্টে অভিজ্ঞতা নেয়ার সুযোগ পেয়েছি, তবে সীমিত আয়ের ছাত্র সমাজকে নিয়ে Take A Bite এর মতন এভাবে কোনোদিন কাউকে মাথা ঘামাতে দেখিনি। সাধ্যের মধ্যে সম্ভব, সর্বোচ্চ মানের খাবার-আমি এখানেই সর্বনিম্ন দামে পেয়েছি। তবে, কখনও কখনও দেখা যায়, কর্ণধার উপস্থিত না থাকলে সেবাদানকারী ব্যক্তিদের তেমন কর্মনিষ্ঠা থাকেনা। হয়তো মনের ভুলে খেয়াল করেন না কিংবা খাবার পরিবেশনে বা, প্রয়োজনীয় সহায়তা প্রদানে অনিচ্ছাকৃত দেরী হয়ে যায়; এগুলোকে আমি ক্ষুদ্র ভুল বলে মনে করি, আশা করি, এ ব্যাপারে কর্তৃপক্ষের সাথে সাথে সদস্যবৃন্দ নিজেরাও সজাগ হবেন। তবে, সকল দিক বিবেচনা করে এই প্রতিষ্ঠানের কর্ণধার ও সদস্যদের জন্যে আন্তরিক অভিনন্দন রইল। পরিশেষে Take A Bite এর উত্তরোত্তর সাফল্য কামনা করছি। HAPPY BITING :D

Hands down, worst pasta I've ever eaten. I'd go one step further and say It's probably the worst fast food I've eaten ever. Pizzas found in Cha Birir tong with a price tag of 25 taka taste much better than this. I ordered a naga baked pasta. It had 70% rubber, 29.99% oil and 0.01% chicken. Not even a single molecule of cheese. Literally there was nothing that can resemble anything close to cheese. There were in total 3 microscopic pieces of chicken. Taste: 0/10... Price: -inf / 10 ( I was charged 239 taka for this piece of crap. ) I get that it can be hectic before iftar and quality of some items might fall. But what I was delivered, was simply garbage. Unless someone's dying of hunger, s/he dare not touch this abomination.

টাকা দিয়ে আবর্জনা খাইতে চাইলে বেস্ট দোকান এটা। মিট লাভারস পাস্তা নিছিলাম। মিটের ম ও নাই। পাস্তা তে কোন চিজ ছিল না কত গুলা কাদার মত ময়দা ছিটানো ছিল। এত বাজে পাস্তা আমি জীবনে খাই নাই। আমরা ৩৪ জন সবাই পাস্তা অরডার করছিলাম তাদের এসি কাজ করে না। ভিতরে এত গরম যে ঘামে গোসল করে ফেলেছি। মাহে রমজানের মাঝে এত কষ্ট পাইলাম ফ্রি তে।

প্রথমে গিয়ে দেখলাম পুরা রেস্টুরেন্ট ভরা তাই পাশের রুমে বসালো কিন্তু সেখানে সিগারেট এর গন্ধ এবং বদ্ধ পরিবেশ। এর পর সিট খালি হলে নিয়ে আসে আমাদের অন্য টেবিলে সেখানে দেখি এসি বন্ধ জিজ্ঞাস করায় বললো এসি নষ্ট। এরপর তিনটা পাস্তা অর্ডার দিলাম। প্রায় ২৫ মিনিট পর নিয়ে আসলো দুটি পাস্তা। এর কিছুক্ষণ পর ডেকে জিজ্ঞাস করলাম আরেকটা পাস্তা কোথায়? তখন তারা বললো ও আচ্ছা আপ্নারা তিনটা বলেছিলেন? আরও ২০ মিনিট পর নিয়ে আসলো আরেকটি পাস্তা। যেই প্লেটে পাস্তা দিলো সেটি কোনায় ভাঙা। খাবার দেওয়ার অনেক পরে ড্রিংক্স সারভ করে গেল। হোয়াইট সস নামে যে জিনিস দিল তা থেকে অনেক বেশি রসুনের গন্ধ আসছিল। এরপর বললাম পাস্তা পারসেল করে দিতে। বিরিয়ানির প্যাকাটে পাস্তা ভরে দিল। পাস্তায় যে পরিমান তেল তা দিয়ে দুটি ডিম অনায়াসে ভাজা যাবে। তারা বললো প্যাকেটটা সোজা করে নিয়া যাবেন তেল পরে যাবে। প্যাকেট নিয়ে নিচে নামতে নামতেই জামায় তেল পড়ে যামা নষ্ট হয়ে গেল।

Went to Pasta State Dhanmondi to have unlimited Pasta.... I had buffet and Unlimited meals at least 30-40 times in the last few years but this wast the worst unlimited offer.... Here's a short review~ So when I was entering the restaurant a guy was going out , he came back 1 minute after that and complained that a cockroach came out from his Pizza Box � I saw the cockroach too.... Kinda lost my appetite there... They probably changed his pizza after that. After that we were w...aiting and the electricity went off, The whole restaurant was for at least 15 minutes so I am guessing they don't have a generator. Finally they served the pastas 20 minutes before Iftar... it was looking good to be honest... So after azan we started eating and the next experience is horrible... There was only cheese top layer... they just mixed mayonnaise with some boiled pasta and topped it with a lil bit of cheese and served it... At least 1/5th part of the bowl was full of oil � I ate 20 huges slices of pizza in another restaurant last week so eating 5/6 bowls or atleast 3 bowls of Pasta is nothing for me... My friend didn't even try another bowl... I went for a second one and they said they don't have any more bowls to serve the pastas so they started serving in take away containers.... Btw ALL of the plates and bowls were broken (the edges) I couldn't even finish the second one... so I requested a waiter to pack it up for me so I can give it to someone on the street since it's Ramadan we shouldn't waste food � They packed it up.... Almost everyone took their pasta in parcel because they couldn't finish it... (though it was an unlimited offer) They are serving their "Special Baked Pasta" only with Coke/Sprite~ Price : 345tk (including everything) Taste : 2/10 � Environment : 5/10 Service : 5/10 I won't even recommend my enemy to go and take this order � Really disappointed~

My student was asking me for the past year to meet up with him near his old house. I just couldn't make any time, until today. :( :) I looked up the food places near Taj Mohol road, Dhaka on Google maps, and it was the same old same old, BFC/KFC/Pizza Hut BS. I didn't want to go to any of them. I wanted to try some place new. As I kept searching a little marker stood in one far north-west corner of the map. It read Bell Pattio. I called my student and we met up nearby, only t...o be greeted by an exhausted employee in a small lone, gloomy room of a restaurant. I wondered all the time whether they actually served anything at all. The exhausted employee asked us if we wanted the works, to which we simply replied "sure". The Pizza arrived in 10min. It was the fastest pizza order I ever received in town. And it was superb! I recommend all to come here at least once if not more, in their lifetime. 5/5

They sell sausage pizza in all their varieties... Filmy cafe sell their Pizzas by changing the name and price. I used to buy a lot from them, see my previous comments at this page... But by time, they have resorted to cheating... There are Real Pizza restaurants around... Stay away or regret!!!

My friend and I wanted to try this place after seeing a review on Instagram. It was a little difficult to find since neither of us had been to Shakhertak. We ordered a Meat Lovers Supreme. The pizza arrived in 15-18 mins, piping hot. It was the kind of pizza one would find at a restaurant like Pizza Hut, which was a pleasant surprise. It does say "Beef and Chicken" in the pizza description but they came in sausage form and not their usual form. This was a bit unusual but not a bad idea. The dough was fresh, there was a good amount of cheese, the service was good, and the price was very very reasonable. I hope they continue doing what they're doing because it's working. I hope to visit them once again soon.

শূন্য স্টার দেয়ার কোনো চান্স নাই তাহলে ওইটাই দিতাম। আমি ২ বার গিয়েছি। ২ বারই খাবার থেকে গন্ধ আসছে, বলার পরেও তারা স্বীকার করে না। তারাও নাকে নিয়ে গন্ধ শুকছে কিন্তু তারা কোনো গন্ধ পায় না। খাবারের পরিমাণ অনেক কম। দ্বিতীয়বার যখন যাই তখন বলি খাবারটা কেমন জানি গন্ধ ভেতর থেকে চেঞ্জ করে দেয় কিন্তু কাঁচা কাঁচা স্বাদ থাকে। পরে এক সময় ফোন দিয়ে আমার বন্ধুকে ডাকি সেও গন্ধ পায় কিন্তু তারা কোনো গন্ধ পায় না। চিকেনের মধ্যে শুধু পেঁয়াজ। ব্যবহার ভালো না। বেয়াদবের দল যত্তসব। ওয়েটারকে বললাম এর আগেও আপনাদের এখানে আসছি এবং আপনি ছিলেন, ওয়েটার চিনেই না। যাই হোক পুরা ফাউল একটা রেস্টুরেন্ট। শুধু ভেতরের পরিবেশটাই সুন্দর কেননা কাপলদের জন্য এর চেয়ে নিরিবিলি পরিবেশ আর হয়ই না। কারো যদি টাকা পানিতে ফেলার ইচ্ছা থাকে তাহলে যেতে পারেন। বিঃদ্রঃ রচনা লেখার জন্য দুঃখিত

But coming back to my first point, if you guys can't serve anything within a given time please do have the decency to accept it and tell us on the face. People who came late and ordered late got their foods served but others had to wait for no apparent reason ! Customers don't want 10% honour or whatsoever for your lousy service.. Never going back to your place and obviously not recommending it to others.. but then again with so many customers in your grasp a lousy review doesn't matter anyway.

গতকাল ফুডমার্ট থেকে Bunkers থেকে কাবসা অর্ডার করি। খাবার ইফতারের আগেই আসে এবং ইফতার এর আগে গরম ছিল। যখন ইফতার করার জন্য বক্স গুলা খুলি এর মধ্যে থেকে একটি সালাদ বক্স থেকে অত্যন্ত বাজে গন্ধ বের হচ্ছিল। পরে দেখি চিকেন কারি থেকে বাসি পচা দুর্গন্ধ বের হচ্ছে। এই গুলো দেখে আমার রুচি উঠে গেল এবং বাসায় কেউ কাবসা খাওয়া সাহস করলো না। তাছাড়া কাবসার রাইস নিচের দিকে কেমন জানি দলা দলা বেঁধে ছিল। কেউ যখন খাবে না দুর্গন্ধ খাবার শেষ পযন্ত ফেলে দিতে হলো। জানি না আপনার ইচ্ছে করে পার্সেল এ এইগুলা দেন কিনা যদি রেস্টুরেন্ট এ এমন দিলে আপনারা কি ভাবে রেস্টুরেন্ট চালান আমার ধারণা নাই। মালিকের দৃষ্টি আকর্ষণ করছি , আপনার অজান্তেই আপনার কিচেন স্টাফরা এই কাজ ইচ্ছাকৃত করে থাকলে ব্যবস্থা নিন। খাবার মজা হোক না হোক বিষয় না কিন্তু পচা খাবার গরম করে পার্সেলে পাঠিয়ে গ্রাহকদের সাথে প্রতারণা করবেন না।

খিলগাঁও যে কয় জায়গায় এপর্যন্ত পাস্তা খেয়েছি তার মধ্যে আপনাদের "শেফ স্পেশাল পাস্তা"টা অনেক ভালো লেগেছে। চীজ এন্ড মাংস অনেক ছিলো। আর স্পেশালি পরিবেশ অনেক ভালো। অনেক বেশি স্পেস ইভেন স্মোকিং জোনের স্পেসও অনেকটা জুড়ে। অনায়াসে কোনো বার্থডে প্রোগ্রাম বা যেকোনো সারপ্রাইজ পার্টি দেয়া যাবে। আমিতো প্ল্যান করেছি নেক্সট এখানে কোনো ফ্রেন্ডকে বার্থডে সারপ্রাইজ দিবো। ওনাদের ব্যবহার অনেক ভালো লেগেছে। খাবার যিনি এনে দিয়েছিলেন সিরাজুল ইসলাম নাম ওনার। ওনার বিহেভ অনেক ভালো ছিলো। নিজ থেকে এসে কয়েকবার খোঁজ নিচ্ছিলেন কোনো সমস্যা হচ্ছে কিনা। আইটেম : শেফ স্পেশাল পাস্তা (প্রাইজ ৩২০) রেটিং : ৭/১০ (টেস্ট ভালো ছিলো খাবারের বাট ওনারা খাবারটা দিতে একটু দেরী করেছিলেন। যখন সেকেন্ড টাইম ডাকলাম ববললো ৫ মিনিট এবং তারপরেও ১০ মিনিট লেট করেছে। ওয়েট করা লাগছে অনেকক্ষণ। আর বিল নিতেও অনেক সময় নিয়েছে। এই ব্যাপারটা ভালো লাগেনি।)

During last Saturday, I had Iftar cum dinner buffet at Bunkers. So guys, I am reviewing on the basis of only this; do not relate this with any of their regular platters. I had only tasted what was offered in that buffet menu. THE WORST BUFFET EVER I EXPERIENCED !!!... I am not writing this on anger. I let myself cool down, waited for than two days and were thinking where that went wrong; now reviewing. 1. If a restaurant offers buffet, it should be only buffet. No other regular platter should be offered during that time span. That creates a mess. They were offering buffet with every other regular platters. Hence, there place wasn't well designed and stuffs were not properly trained to handle such mayhem. 2. They offered around 30 items and to refill one dish we had to wait like 10 to 15 minutes; standing in a line. If you don't have enough structural setup and expertise to handle a house full of guests, why you guys offer buffet? 3. There were shortage of food. Usually people have spring roll with soup. They were refilling soup but spring roll was vanished; literally vanish after first round. When I asked, they replied (শেষ হয়ে গেসে ভাইয়া, সরি). What nonsense is that? Do you guys even know what buffet means? 4. And there was an item of chicken covered with sauce (I forgot the name). That was good. I could grab 3 pieces and yet again, never refilled. According to their menu, they should have an item of beef, haven't seen it. A guest from the next table said that they gave a new dish, spicy chicken; I went and an empty plate was there. I complained and probably the store manager said (স্যার, দিয়ে তো কুলাতে পারছি না, দেয়ার সাথে সাথেই শেষ হয়ে যাচ্ছে). Dear that person, let me apologize for my language, but are you stupid? Do the math. Count the number of ovens you have, number of cooks in there, stuffs you have, estimate your food preparation pace, understand how many guests you can handle and over buffet for 5 less than that number. If you cannot cope up with the pace even once, you should be really really sorry. 5. And, now comes the topic of mighty PIZZA. Pizza wasn't included in the buffet menu they showed me but they were offering it. WORLD'S THINNEST PIZZA, I MUST SAY! :P Everyone must go and have a look; really astonishing. 6. Buffet time was till 9PM and most of the dishes were vanished around 7.45PM. People were starting to leave and around 8PM I left with the worst buffet experience in my life.

#Negative_Review Place: Spice Route অর্ডার করেছিলাম "Chinese Fusion"। তাদের পেইজের ছবি দেয়া হোলো, দাম ৮৫০/-(ভ্যাট আলাদা)। রেষ্ট্রুরেন্টে যাবার পর কোনো ওয়েটার এসে টেবিল পরিষ্কার করেনি। অনেক্ষণ অপেক্ষা করে, ডাকার পর তারা এসে পরিষ্কার করে দেন। অর্ডার কনফার্ম করার বেশ কিছুক্ষণ পর এসে জানায় "Chinese Fusion" এর তান্দুরী চিকেন শেষ। এর বদলে ২টো করে থাই ফ্রাইড চিকেন দেবেন। এতক্ষণ অপেক্ষার পর তা মেনে নেয়াই জুতসই মনে হলো। আনুমানিক ২০-২৫ মিনিট পর এলো স্যুপ, ওনথোন, ফ্রায়েড প্রণ। স্যুপ এত পাতলা যেন মসুর ডাল, তার মধ্যে ৩-৪ পিস আদার টুকরা। ওনথন চালিয়ে দেয়া যায়। আসি সবচেয়ে ইন্টেরেস্টিং, ফ্রায়েড প্রণে। প্রণের উপরের ব্রেড কোটিং এত পুরু যে প্রথম কামড়ে আপনি প্রণের কাছাকাছি নাই যেতে পারেন। এবং ভেতরের প্রণটি বাসী, দুর্গন্ধযুক্ত। এবার মেইন কোর্স। ফ্রাইড রাইস না বলে এটাকে ভাত ভাজা বললে বেশ জমবে। সামান্য ডিম আর গাজর দিয়ে ভাত ভেজে নেয়া। ভেজিটেবল টার কোনো স্বাদ অনূভূতিতে আঘাত করলো না। না মিষ্টি না নোনতা। ফ্রায়েড চিকেন এভারেজ। বিফ কারী টা আশ্চর্যজনক ভাবে বেশ ভালো! সাধারণ চাইনিজ এর বীফের মতো শক্ত নয়, বেশ মোলায়েম। সাথে ছিলো ময়লা লাগানো শসা। অবশেষে ২ দলা (স্কুপ) আইসক্রিম। এবার আসা যাক তাদের আচরণে। বেসিক কার্টেসী, ম্যানার তো বহুদূর তাদের বডি ল্যাংগুয়েজ বেশ মারমুখী। হেলেদুলে গান গাইতে গাইতে হাটার মতো। খাবারের ট্রে টেবিলে ধাক্কা দিয়ে দিতে দেখেছি। আমাদের সামনেই আরেক টেবিলে ফ্যামিলি ডিনারে এসেছেন সম্ভবত, তাদের একজন তো শেষমেশ রিয়াক্ট ই করে বসলেন। "Is this the way you treat your guest? Aren't we your guests?" কষ্ট করে কামানো নিজের টাকা দিয়ে জঘন্য খাবার ও জঘন্য আচরণ দেখতে চাইলে মিস করবেন না। মুসলিম হিসেবে অপর ভাইকে সচেতন করার লক্ষ্যে রিভিউ দেয়া। ভালো থাকুন। সকল প্রশংসা আল্লাহ্'র।

তারা খুব বেশি ভদ্র ভাবে মানুষ কে রমজান মাসে না করে দিতে পারে।বুঝতে পারছেন না তাই তো??বর্তমান অনলাইন এর যুগে আমরা তাদের সাথে কথা বলি অনলাইন ভিত্তিক যোগাযোগ মাধ্যমে এবং তাদের নিশ্চিত করি যে আমরা আগামী সপ্তাহে ঠিক এইবারে ইফতার করতে।তারা ও নিশ্চিত করে আমাদের যে তারা আয়োজন করে দিতে পারবে। লোকসংখ্যা ও বেশি ছিল না।তো যেদিন আমরা ইফতার এর জন্য যাই তারা জানায় যে তাদের ১৫০ মানুষ এর বুকিং আসে। আমরা যখন জিজ্ঞেস করি যে আমরা তো ১ সপ্তাহ আগে নিশ্চিত করেছি তখন তারা বলে যে advance এর টাকা দিয়ে...
দাম অনুযায়ী খাবারের মানটা আরেকটু ভালো করা দরকার, কারন সেলফি তোলা আর আড্ডা দেওয়া ছাড়াও মানুষ যে খেতে আসে তা মাথায় রাখা উচিৎ। আমার কাছে এভারেজ লাগছে তবে আশা রাখি সামনের দিকে আরও ভালো হবে।

আমি এবং আমার বন্ধুরা ইফতার করতে তাদের সাথে তাদের ফেসবুক পেজ এ যোগাযোগ করি এবং তাদের নিশ্চিত করি যে আমরা আগামী সপ্তাহে ঠিক এইবারে ইফতার করতে যাব ।তারা ও নিশ্চিত করে আমাদের যে তারা আয়োজন করে দিতে পারবে। তো যেদিন আমরা ইফতার এর জন্য যাই তারা জানায় যে তাদের ১৫০ মানুষ এর বুকিং আসে। আমরা যখন জিজ্ঞেস করি যে আমরা তো ১ সপ্তাহ আগে নিশ্চিত করেছি তখন তারা বলে যে advance এর টাকা দিয়ে তারপর নাকি নিশ্চিত করতে হবে।(যদিও এমন কথা আমি কোন রেস্টুরেন্ট এ শুনি নাই।)তারপর ও জিজ্ঞেস করলাম যা আপনারা আমাদের অনলাইন এ জানান নাই কেন? তখন তারা বলল যে তারা নাকি অনলাইন এ সচল না এতটা।এখন আমার কথা হচ্ছে যে আপনারা যদি ফেসবুক পেজ এ সব তথ্য দিতে না পারেন তবে অর্ধেক তথ্য দিয়ে আমাদের কেন বিপদে ফেলছেন???সারাদিন রোজা রেখে এতটা পেরেশানি তে না হয় নাই পরতাম।আসলে বেশি মানুষ পেয়ে গেসে তাই আমাদের বুকিং কে প্রাধান্য দেই নাই এটা আসল সত্য।
খিলগাঁও তালতলায় রেস্টুরেন্ট প্রয়োজনের তুলনায় অনেক বেশি, তাই কম্পিটিশনও বেশি। রেগুলার কাস্টমার পেতে চাইলে অবশ্যই খাবারের দাম কমাতে হবে। পরিবেশ ভালো কিন্তু দাম বেশি।

Last Friday we planned to dine out and headed to Pizza Hut at Dampara, Chittagong. We ordered for a large size cheesy bite pizza with chicken & other expected toppings, baked chicken pasta, fried button mushroom and cream of chicken soup. We were really shocked to find just a few tiny chunks of chicken as part of the toppings over the so-called pizza. Cream of chicken soup was also nothing special. By pouring little cream on a typical glutinous soup, you can't name it cream o...f chicken soup for your very kind information. Trust me, I had much better baked pasta at Da Signature in Chittagong and Shawarma House in Dhaka. Your baked pasta was awefully gravy when the cheese layer was taken off the top. Are you guys making money in Bangladesh by fooling innocent hard-working people down here? Are you ripping us off by using the brand "Pizza Hut"?

Ordered two medium pizzas with extra cheese on both of them. Got one perfectly cut pizza with cheese on top of it and other one with no extra cheese and cut unevenly. Moreover, both of them were cold. Why is your delivery service so poor?

I order almost 2-3 times a week from Pizza Hut PHD Dhanmondi. I order pizza all the time but unfortunately I ordered the chicken mushroom pasta today which happens to be the worst pasta I ever had. No trace of white sauce, the use of slightly roasted onions was so much that it made me wonder if the main ingredient was pasta or onion. You guys just packed me a box full of garbage! Picture in the comment section!
One of the worst pizza i ever had in my life.Better you serve better food by increasing your price or better walk out from your business.Food is not always about price.Quality is important.

Good God! After enjoying meals in Pizza hut across the world all my life, I took my boy out during the school break for a treat. He ordered the "special" pizza... which turned out to be nothing remotely like what we're used to. Listen, seriously, I know this is Bangladesh and all and you're trying to cater to the native palate but **you don't have to**... pizza hut is now off our list of places (for me and my wife and my son - hat-trick - perfect) because of this monstrosity they served us. If I wanted a Bengali pizza from an American chain (on home ground), I'd head down to my local Habib Hotel and order their curry and rice. It was hideous. The product development team need to stick up a reminder on their desks, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it!" Meanwhile, I shall be taking my wallet somewhere where I get a pizza when I order one.

I ordered pizza by Food panda. the worst ever i eat. this is iftre time guys. my family didn't told me anything. they send me two pizza. it was buy 1 get 1 free offer. but there is no cheese (what we expected). bread was too much dry. after the iftar, in night i baked extra slice in oven and what??? it looks same as a "pauruti" with some onion :( ...sorry pizza hut. please do something good, because you have good reputation in pizza. :( sorry for poor rating.

To the authority, I have been a dedicated customer of Pizza Hut for more than 5 years. Your pizzas and service has always intrigued me. However, recently I have seen you charge high "exclusive" VAT and Tax rates for the products. For example, you are charging VAT and Tax for buying soft drinks from your outlets at high rates (BDT132/- VAT+Appl SD for Cheese Lovers and one Mirinda worth BDT 548/- total). Another case: BDT 104/- VAT+Appl SD for a meal worth BDT 699/- I want to know the reason behind this increase. Regards, A Dedicated Customer of Pizza Hut who is loosing faith in the services of the brand.

I used to be very regular at Pizza hut. Recently I had been to pizza hut, gulshan outlet. The service and food quality had been degraded so much I had no idea. I used to keep on calling for attendees, keep asking for services but it took a lot of time to seek their attention. For payment they took my card and no one returned it back. I had to rush to other waiters to find out my cards. Then managers had to come to sort out problems. I had never faced such service. Very heartbroken with the carelessness. Also the taste of food changed drastically. I really don't know is there any reason left I will ever visit there. very much disappointing.

Alhumdulillah! Had a wonderful time at pizza hut gulshan 1 today. We arranged an iftar party for 60 orphans there in a reasonable price n the staff n service were genuinely warm n helpful. Mr shamim, the manager with koushik n rajib, the staff made the experience-memorable for the children. May Allah bless them

Today I tried the chicken arrabbiata pasta from your Bashundhara outlet. The pasta was absolutely disgusting! I know it is not right to criticize food this way but the food you served tasted so bad. Such a waste of money. There was no cheese and the pasta was undercooked. No wonder this particular outlet is always empty.
nice atmosphere good food

I want to thank pizza hut chittagong CDA Ave (near bus stop) for extraordinary service. We were travelling from CTG to Dhaka. We ordered a pizza and said that our bus will leave in 5 mins, can u make it? They said they ll deliver if they cant. So time ran out and our bus was leaving, so we hurriedly went for the bus and asked them to cancel the order. Our bus started and we were upset that pizza hut couldn’t provide our food. Suddenly the bus stopped and a pizza hut delivery guy came in with our pizza. We were shocked! He chased the bus to deliver our pizza. This shows amazing customer service from them. Thank u again and special thanks to the delivery guy.
Presentation is a factor, Sometimes in rash situation we do lacks in our presentation. But I prefer Pizza Hut for it's itself image.

মূলত যুক্তরাষ্ট্রে কোম্পানিটির ব্র্যান্ডে পূর্ণ পরিবর্তন আনার জন্যই এমনটি করা হয়েছে। নতুনভাবে নির্মিত রেস্তোঁরাগুলোতে এই নতুন স্বাক্ষর এবং প্রতীক ব্যবহৃত হবে। অবশ্য আগের রেস্তোঁরাগুলোতে ১৯৯১ সালের পুরনো প্রতীকই ব্যবহার করা হবে বলে সিদ্ধান্ত নেয়া হয়েছে। তবে বর্তমানে বিভিন্ন বিজ্ঞাপনের জন্য কেএফসি নামটিই মুক্তভাবে ব্যবহৃত হচ্ছে। আন্তর্জাতিকভাবে এটি এখনও কেএফসি নামেই বেশি পরিচিত। কেএফসি বিশ্বব্যাপী বিপুল জনপ্রিয়তা অর্জন করে। এরই স্বীকৃতিস্বরূপ পৃথিবীর বিভিন্ন দেশের রেস্তোঁরা মালিকরা এই নামটি খাদ্যের মান হিসেবে ব্যবহৃত হচ্ছে। অর্থাৎ কোন রেস্তোঁরায় যদি কেএফসির সমমানের খাদ্যমান বজায় রাখতে পারে তাহলে তাদেরকে এই নামে আখ্যায়িত করা যাচ্ছে।

Thank you so much for existing. First time I ordered your pizza today and honestly was really skeptic about it. On just a small note I do think the onions are kind of a little turn off, but not much big of a deal. And the MiCasa sauce could be just a little less watery, but then again didn't keep me out. লোভে পাপ, পাপে মৃত্যু !! লোভের বশে ধানমণ্ডির Impasto নামক একটা ক্যাফেতে যাই ১২৯০ টাকায় সারা দুনিয়া খেয়ে উড়ায় দিবো এই ভেবে! কিন্তু এদের খাবার খেয়ে মনে হইছে এরচেয়ে টাকা দিয়ে মাটি কিনে খাওয়াও ভালো ছিলো! এদের সার্ভিস শুধু স্লো না, ভাবখানা এমন - অর্ডার করার পর এরা বাজারে যায় রান্নার জিনিস পাতি কিনতে! ধৈর্য শক্তি রবার্ট ব্রুসের মত না হলে এইখানে না যাওয়াই উত্তম। আর খাবার আসতে যেহেতু ভয়ঙ্কর লেট হয়, তাই পর্যাপ্ত পরিমান খাবার, গুর,মুড়ি,ছোলা, চিড়া, খাবার স্যালাইন, পর্যাপ্ত পানি, পেট খা... এইবার আসি ওদের মাথা নস্ট অফারের খাবার গুলোতে! প্রথমেই দিয়ে গেলো তেল চটচটা বাসি,পুরাতন, ভকভক করে তেলের গন্ধ আসা অতি অখাদ্য পর্যায়ের ফ্রেঞ্চ ফ্রাই! ‘লেতলেতা’ ওয়ার্ড টা বাংলা ভাষায় আর কোন কিছুর সাথে ইউজ করতে না পারলেও ওদের ফ্রেঞ্চ ফ্রাই এর সাথে এই ওয়ার্ড টা দিব্বি যায়! দুই পিস মুখে দিয়ে হাসি মুখে বললাম – খুব অসাধারন খেতে! প্লিজ নিয়ে যান এটা। আপনারা খান।’ চিকেন উইংস নামে একটা নোংরা জিনিস আমার টেবিলে আসলো এরপর! একটা ভালো খাবারকে কিভাবে অখাদ্য বানানো যায় এই বিষয়ে তাদের পি এইচ ডি আছে নির্ঘাত! চিকেন উইংস এর সাথে পচা গলা কিছু নাড়িভুঁড়িও ফ্রি পেলাম! হাইজিন বিষয়ে অজ্ঞতার কারনে এটা হয়ে থাকতে পারে! সস যেটা দিছে ওইটা টোমেটর কিনা জানি না! উপরে লাল রঙ ভেসে থাকতে দেখে খাওয়ার রুচি হলো না। খাওয়ার অযোগ্য এই সস দিয়ে বড় জোড় বাংলা সিনেমায় গুলি খাওয়া নায়কের রক্তাক্ত বুকের দৃশ্য ধারন করা যেতে পারে! এরপর আসলো কোক! দেওয়ার কথা এক লিটারের বোতল! বাস্তবে নিয়ে আসলো দুই গ্লাস কোক! তাও আবার পানি দেওয়া! আপনি ভাবতে পারেন বিষয়টা? হাফ গ্লাস কোকে হাফ গ্লাস পানি ঢালার পরও কোকের টেস্ট এতো বাজে হয় কিনা জানি না! এতক্ষন চুপ করে ছিলাম! এরপর আর রি-এক্ট না করে পারলাম না! অলরেডি তখন আশে পাশের টেবিলের লোকজন টেবিল ছেড়ে উঠে কমপ্লেইন এর পর কমপ্লেইন করে ভাসিয়ে ফেলছে! পিছনের টেবিলের এক ভাইয়া আপু খাবার না খেয়েই রাগ করে উঠে গেলেন বিল দিতে! যাই হোক সবশেষে দিয়ে গেলো পিজা! পর্যাপ্ত পরিমান চিনি দিয়ে মিষ্টি করা কিউট বার বি কিউ পিজা এতো সুইট কেনো জানতে চাইলে ওরা বলল যে বার বি কিউ পিজা নাকি মিষ্টি হয়! আমি সব শুনে বললাম ‘ও আচ্ছা!’ এই জিনিস ওইখানে বসে খাবার উপায় ছিলো না। বললাম ভাই পিজা গুলা প্যাক করে দেন! উনারা সুন্দর মত কোন বক্সে না দিয়ে বাজারের আলু মুলা যেসব ব্যাগে ঝুলিয়ে আনে ওই ক্যাটাগরির একটা ব্যাগে এক্ টার উপর আরেকটা ফেলে জগা খিচুরি বানিয়ে হাতে ধরায় দিলো! Now the question comes! Who cares for my money ?? Consumer satisfaction বলে একটা মার্কেটিং টার্ম আছে যেটা চটকদার ভুগি চুগি বিজ্ঞাপন থেকে অনেক ভালো কাজ করে। নাইলে স্টার কাবাব , নান্নার বিরিয়ানির মত দোকান গুলো কোন রকম বিজ্ঞাপন ছাড়া টিকে থাকতে পারতো না! Impasto কে ম্যানশন করে বলছি! ভাই চটকদার বিজ্ঞাপনের ফাঁদে আমাদের মত হাবাগোবা কাস্টমারদের একদিনের জন্য বলদ বানিয়ে কয় টাকার বিজনেস করবেন? এরচেয়ে এইসব বিজ্ঞাপনে পয়সা ওয়েস্ট না করে Consumer Satisfaction কে মার্কেটিং এর পুঁজি বানান। দেখবেন একটা সাথে দশটা জিনিস ফ্রি দিয়ে কাস্টমার ধরতে হচ্ছে না, এম্নিতেই দোকানে লাইন পরে যাবে! Finally, I wish Impasto guys will take a lesson out of the post. They should take the criticism sportingly to overcome their limitations. Good Luck!

এই ঈদ-উল-আযহার ৩য় দিন আমি পরিবার-পরিজন নিয়ে বাইরে কোন ভাল রেস্টুরেন্টে খাওয়ার প্ল্যান করলাম । লোকমুখে সুস্বাদু, স্বাস্থ্যকর খাবার এবং সুন্দর পরিবেশ সম্পর্কে খুব ভাল সুনাম শুনে SHAWARMA KING এর খিলগাঁও ব্রাঞ্চে আমাদের যাওয়ার সৌভাগ্য হয় । ওখানে গিয়ে দেখলাম, মাশাল্লাহ! মানুষের প্রচুর সমাগম যেখানে আমাদের কাঙ্ক্ষিত আসন পেতে ৩০মিনিট পর্যন্ত অপেক্ষা করতে হয়েছিল । তাতেও আমরা অনেক আনন্দিত এই ভেবে যে, আমরা অনেক ভাল, সুস্বাদু ও স্বাস্থ্যকর খাবার এবং পরিবেশ উপভোগ করতে পেরেছি, যা না বললেই নয় । তাদের সুস্বাদু খাবার ও পরিবেশের সাথে সাথে তাদের সেবার মানও যথেষ্ট ভাল ও আন্তরিক । ধন্যবাদ SHAWARMA KING কে । আশা করি, তাদের গুণগত মান সফলতার সাথে আজীবন ধরে রাখতে পারবেন।

I used to like visiting this cafe but yesterday's experience has made me determined never to visit the place again. I was there with friends and each time my friends wanted to order something, the waiter countered asking them to order someone else. For example, a friend ordered Thai chicken, and the waiter said to order grilled chicken. Another friend ordered chicken pizza and the waiter said to order seafood pizza. These are just 2 examples. The entire fiasco went for more than 15 minutes. And the waiter wasn't even suggesting alternatives. He was blatantly saying, no try the other one. I was extremely pissed with the service and never going back there again.

We went at around 1 pm, and a little later the waiter told us the food would be around 20 minutes late. This was supposed to be brunch, so we asked them to serve us some food which would come fast, while we waited for the rest. They told us the prawn dim sum would be served in 5 minutes, but it came 20 minutes later. After an hour and half, around 2:30pm, we still hadn't been served anything else! We told the manager that we'll only take any food which they could serve by 2:30, but they failed to serve us our orders even by then. We paid for the dim sums and left ravenously hungry, with no apologies from the manager. Apparently there was some owner's brunch which caused this unacceptable delay! Worst service ever.
Great food, excellet customer service and

I love Chow's dumplings but the price I pay for includes food n service both. We went for a friend's birthday last month n ordered the lamb from the main course (as I had it before n I liked it). I put a piece in my mouth and found the lamb totally cold. My friend thought that the dish has to be served cold but as I mentioned that I had it before. So, I called the waiter n told him about it. He took away the dish right then and came back with explanation - "the chef went out ...of the kitchen so the other person in charge prepared the dish and he forgot that he didn't warm it." We are paying this price to have refrigerated food??? The manager came to say sorry n served us complementary brownie but how can it replace the fact that they serve cold food from the refrigerator. I have never seen the management write a reply to any of the reviewer so I wonder, does it really make any difference to them?
wow food is very good.And they are service is nice.we are comfortable.thanx all the members..
horrible....price wasn't justified with the quantity of food..so was the taste �...and really dissappointed.

Let's get one thing clear. A restaurant like Chows has two things to offer. Cuisine and service. Food is great. Proportions are not. Service not good at all. They'll take orders only to return about it's unavailability or the excuse of how difficult it would be to serve hot n sour soup as they're backedup at the kitchen. One garcon even took my dinner plate along with cutleries thinking that i'm done eating. I thought he's giving me a fresh plate after i tried their delicious flash fried whole fish. But I was mistaken :) Great chef. Poor service.

I was impressed by the decor but was disappointed soon by the food. Food is overpriced and bland. The quantity of each item was very small compared to its high price.I had better dumplings in Dhaka. The chowmein was chewy, leathery and cold. I didn't find any Cantonese flavour in any dish. Even the iced tea was very bitter. The service was very slow and poor. I didn't expect such poor service and bad food from a high-end restaurant like Chows.

A complete disappointment, most of the food we ordered was left uneaten as it tasted stale and unappetizing , the prawns we ordered tasted mushy and had a funky flavor, as did their whole fried fish and fried rice, not at all what you'd expect from a premium establishment. Do not recommend and definitely won't be coming back.

Ambiance is perfect for any hangout. Interior is beautiful & serene. Food is also awesome.. The prawn har gow, chicken sui mai, chicken chilly with black bean sauce.. Though the beef item that we ordered could not stand up to our expectations. But overall it was a nice place to spend time with near & dear ones with delicious food added.

Was extremely disappointed with the service yesterday. We went there for brunch and waited for nearly 1.5 hours and yet the food was not served. Whenever we inquired about the order, they kept insisting that the food would be out in 10-15 minutes. Eventually we got up and left. The staff needs to be given a training on customer service (try getting a crash course from the staff at Izumi)!
Salt is a major concern. All the dishes that we had it was salty. Decor and service we're excellent. We reserved the private room.

Well the food was good as usual. But a bit disappointed on the buffet offering during iftar. I thought the menu would be eat as much as you can but i was surprised with the appetiser being served once as set menu and buffet dinner on the five mains. Come on chows your edm for the offer was misleading

I made a reservation for four at 2:30 pm yesterday. I was there on time, however, my friends had reached a few minutes prior to 3:00 pm. Before they could make themselves comfortable, a waiter insisted that we order at once, since apparently their kitchen closes at 3:00 pm. We did, and waited for 40 minutes (which they asked from us) for our food. Immediately after we finished, our waiter had gotten us the bill before we even asked, and said that they were to have a staff pa...rty- an implication that we leave. The food was good, but not out of the world. Therefore, from such a high-end restaurant, service at-least is well desired from a customer's end. Provided the place would be overcrowded (or even close to being crowded) on the occasion of Pohela Boishakh, I would have understood. I'm afraid that many other reviews well portray how they tend to serve their customers.

By far The best Chinese in town. Food is excellent and so is the ambience & service. No wonder why the elites and diplomats living around patronise it so highly both at lunch and dinner. However prices of items in recent months have been jacked up. But then in a premium eatery one has to pay premium rates I guess.

We availed the buffet iftar,dinner. But the iftar was set menu and dinner had only 5 items including rice & chowmein moreover the taste was average. I don't know about their regular menu but the buffet was not good.

Serious lack of cordiality comparing to the other places I have visited within last few days.. If u want to have good Chinese food find an alternative restaurant.. Interior is beautiful and a dimsum probably named prawn chicken Sui mai tastes good, the ginger drink was good but such a small amount was given
nothing special.... so so... we went two times but food was not that tasty according to the price...and recent days food served cold in many restaurants, don't know why??
I agree with some of the comments based on my experience. Great Food. Poor Service. This is the best way to summarize my experience at Chows. They really, really, really need to focus on service.

26th of March in the evening I was invited @chows hosted by my brother Azizur Rahman (Tel no 01713038440,) We ordered food but they failed to serve on time. First we wish to have some soup before the main course but they failed to serve accordingly to our choice. Food quality was excellent, but we were not satisfied with waiter's service.

After all the reviews about their service being not up to mark, i was a bit skeptical. But i was really surprised to find their service top of the line. They were very humble and veryyy nice. every person who came to our table and served us food had a big smile and they really do make u feel good about ordering and eating there. The food was just next level. My friends finished most of the appetizers by the time i was there but the 1s i did get to try were mind blowing. also ...their sauces are out of this world (especially this black bean sauce). i do not remember the name of the items but we had a fish a beef a chicken and noodles. each of them were perfect in their own way although i thought the noodles cud improve a wee bit. the fish (fish with black beans think) was the best. we all thoroughly loved the meal but my friends kept saying the appetizers (which i misssed) were better than the main course. Overall it was a great experience. i simply loved it. oh and the place is gorgeous and very well maintained. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!

Had a dinner reservation for 3 and after reading several of the reviews on the page and suggestions from family and friends, decided to have a Dim Sum night. Placed 6 orders of various Dim Sums. The first one to arrive was the Steamed Spicy Glass Noodle Dumplings which were average, not my preference. I was quite taken away by the Steamed Mushroom and Herb Dumplings, sort of reminded me of the mushroom momos from Crepe o Momo. That's the end of vegetarian dishes and now my fa...vorite, the meat dim sums. The Chicken and Prawn Sui Mai were tasty, a little hot and would order again. The Beef Cheung Fung looked tastier than it really was. A friend described the taste as a savoury lychee. On the other hand the Crispy Prawn Cheung Fung was the highlight of the night and ended up ordering two of those. The last order was a Prawn and Water Chestnut Dumplings which I devoured with complete satisfaction. At the end of the night, I was full and content. To accompany the dim sum was still water, and service was normal, nothing extraordinary. Overall good dining experience, loved the decor and would visit again.

I made a reservation at Chows and went their with my foreign guests. Went I called them to reserve a table they told me that the last order was at 3pm however they will consider my foreign guests and still serve us lunch after hours. When I went there with my guests they literally shut the door on our face and refused us to enter the restaurant. They should have never accepted our reservation if they were unable to serve. They don't have basic human decency. I even told them ...that my Chinese guests would just like to look around even if they cant serve us lunch. Still they shut the door on our faces. How can they be so rude to customers when they will have no business without us. I sincerely advice them to learn how to operate a restaurant and teach their staff basic manners. There are number of Chinese restaurants in Dhaka so don't think that your restaurant is any special.

The people of Tokyo Express have turned to thievery these days.
